title: Introduction
data:
Welcome to B1

B1 is designed to help you manage your tasks and contributions easily in one place. This Help Center will guide you through the main features and ensure you get the most out of the app.

What you can do with B1:

  • Track and manage your contributions with ease
  • View payment status directly inside the app
  • Verify your identity for improved security
  • Access a support system whenever you need help

Getting Started:

  1. Download and install the B1 app from the official store.
  2. Open the app and create an account or sign in if you already have one.
  3. Follow the on-screen instructions to set up your profile.
  4. Explore the home screen to discover available features.

Screenshots:

Below are some screenshots showing what you’ll see when you first open B1:

Next Steps:

Once you’ve familiarized yourself with the basics, check out the other sections in this Help Center such as Contributions, Payments, and Verification to learn more.

title: Creating Your Account
data:
Creating Your Account

To get started with B1, you’ll need to create an account. This allows you to access personalized features such as contributions, package plans, and secure settings.

Steps to Create an Account:

  1. Open the B1 app and type your email address into the email input.
  2. Enter your details if your account does not exist (name, gender, phone number, state and city).
  3. Set a secure pin or choose biometric authentication if supported.
  4. Verify your account via the verifiction page.

Tip:

If you already have an account, type in your existing credentials instead.

title: Managing Your Profile
data:
Managing Your Profile

You can edit your personal details and update your account profile from the Account screen.

Steps to Manage Your Profile:

  1. Go to Account from the main menu.
  2. Tap Account Profile.
  3. Update your first and last name, gender, and phone number as needed.
  4. Save changes to keep your profile up-to-date.
  5. To update your profile image, click on the image avatar.

title: Security Settings
data:
Security Settings

Keep your account safe with security features built into B1. You can set up biometric login, PIN codes, and access approvals.

Available Options:

  • Change Security Option: Switch between biometric authentication (fingerprint/face) or PIN.
  • Access Approvals: Require verification before accessing the app for extra security.

title: Remember Activities
data:
Remember Activities

The Remember Activities option allows the app to save your last session so you can continue where you left off.

How to Use:

  1. Navigate to the Account page.
  2. Toggle the Remember Activities switch on or off.

When enabled, B1 remembers your last activity each time you log back in.

title: Deleting Your Account
data:
Deleting Your Account

You can permanently delete your account from the Account screen. This action removes all your data and cannot be undone.

Steps to Delete Your Account:

  1. Go to the Account page.
  2. Scroll down to the Delete Account section.
  3. Tap Delete Account.
  4. Confirm the action by typing in your account's email address'.

Warning: Deleting your account will erase all contributions, payment history, and verification details linked to your account.

Tip:

If your account has any active contributions, you won't be able to delete your account.

title: Selecting A Package Plan
data:
Selecting A Package Plan

A package plan is a savings plan you subscribe to, this tells B1 what kind of savings you are saving up for. To view available packages go to the Package Plan screen.

Steps to Selecting Your Desired Package:

  1. Go to the Package Plan page by clicking the package icon at the top of the app's page.
  2. Plans are grouped based on Types. Select your desired type, swipe through to view available packages and click on the + icon to view more details about any plan.
  3. Tap Start Saving Plan to send a request to join a contribution group for your desired plan.

Tip:

Depending on your account, you can only send one contribution request at a time.

title: Managing Your Contributions
data:
Managing Your Contributions

Manage contributions you belong to with top-grade management features built into B1. You can manage all contributions from the Contibution screen.

Management Features:

  • View All Contributions & Statuses: All your contributions are made available to you through this screen, you can also track request status.
  • Cancel Requests: Through the contribution screen, you can cancel pending contribution requests.
  • Track Group Saving Progress: With an intuitive management design, you can view group saving progress, group member payment progress, as well as whose turn to receive payment.

title: Cancel A Contribution Request
data:
Cancel A Contribution Request

You can cancel a pending contribution request from the Contribution screen. This action revokes your request to join a group in which you had earlier requested to join.

Steps to Cancel A Contribution Request:

  1. Go to the Contributions page.
  2. Identify and select the contribution group you want to cancel from.
  3. Tap Cancel Plan to immediately revoke your request for that plan.
  4. If you accidentally cancel a request, you can request to join it again through the package plan screen.

Tip:

If your request is not pending and the contribution group kick-off date has not reached, you will be required to submit a request to cancel.

title: B1 Pay-In Account Info
data:
B1 Pay-In Account Info

To mitigate the likelihood of payment issues, B1 business account with account name B1 Integrated Services is the only authorized and valid account for all contribution group pay-in. The account information is available to customers with an active contribution group.

Steps to Get B1 Pay-In Account Info:

  1. Go to the Contributions page.
  2. Identify and select an active contribution group.
  3. Tap the Info icon to see more info about the group and also the account info.

Tip:

Always submit a payment verification request after making any contribution group payment.

title: Manage Payments
data:
Manage Payments

You can manage your account pay-ins from the Payment screen. Statuses and payment verification requests can be initiated from this screen

Things You Can Do:

  1. View payment statuses.
  2. Initiate payment verification requests.

title: Payment Verification Request
data:
Payment Verification Request

A payment verification request is a digital way of submiting a payment transfer receipt. With B1 app, you can initiate this request and your payment transfer will be automatically handled.

Steps to Create Payment Verification Request:

  1. Go to the Payment screen.
  2. Tab + icon at the top of the screen.
  3. Follow the instruction on the request setup screen and submit when done.

Tip:

You can only submit requests for a specific period once.

title: Verify Your Account
data:
Verify Your Account

Your account verification is important because without it you can't get the most out of the B1 app. With a verified account, you can subscribe to package plans and enjoy the full benefits of B1 services

Steps to Verify Your Account:

  1. Go to the Verification screen. It should look similar to this.
  2. Tab Identification Document box under requirements.
  3. Follow the instruction on the screen and submit when done.

Tip:

If your document is rejected you can submit another document, but until then you can't edit submited document.
